setup: 1. Ensure backend server is running on http://localhost:8001
2. Ensure frontend server is running on http://localhost:5173
registration_steps: 3. Fill in user details from registration_data
4. Submit form and verify successful registration
6. Access vendor dashboard and add sample products
verification_steps: 1. Check if storefront URLs are accessible
2. Verify user can create, edit, and delete products
3. Test click tracking on public storefront
4. Confirm analytics dashboard shows correct data

notes: Generated on July 31, 2025 for QuickVendor integration testing
These are dummy users for development and testing purposes only
WhatsApp numbers use Nigerian format (+234) but are fictional
Passwords include special characters for security testing
Email addresses use example.com domain to avoid conflicts
